portfolioItems.title: Volební kalkulačka
portfolioItems.description: Volební kalkulačka® (English: voting advice application) is a simple online tool that compares your political views with those of political parties or individuals (such as lawmakers or election candidates). Created by the KohoVolit.eu association and developed by Česko.digital, which has also been successfully implemented in Austria and Hungary.

portfolioItems.title: michalwierzgon.dev
portfolioItems.description: One-page portfolio created to showcase projects and track progress in learning front-end development.
